#sidebar TOC

= trackbacks =

List of posts referencing an url.

== Parameters: ==

|| *Name*   || *Required* || *Description* ||
|| url      || required   || URL string for the target. ||
|| contains || optional   || Query string to filter results. ||

Accepts [ResListParameters List Parameters]


== Example: ==

{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/trackbacks.json?url=http://topsy.com/
}}}

This will fetch posts in json format that reference Topsy's homepage.
